column1: Local Foods////We must have arrived at just the right time
column2: our meal was brought to us really quickly and it was just delicious. I ordered the kale salad and coleslaw sides while David got the chips and barley. Seriously
column3: everything was really good. I wasn't a huge fan of the kale but David loved it
column4: and he didn't enjoy the barley too much and I liked it.
